<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Impressive Landing](/Feats.aspx?ID=5848) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Barbarian" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=813" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 82 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Trigger**
You fall at least 10 feet and land on a solid surface.

</column>

---

You slam into the ground, shattering it around you. Treat the fall as 10 feet shorter. You land on your feet. The ground in a 5-foot emanation becomes [difficult terrain](/Rules.aspx?ID=453). Any creature in the emanation when you land takes 5 bludgeoning damage as the debris hits it and is [off-guard](/Conditions.aspx?ID=58) until the start of its next turn.
name: Impressive Landing
